page.title: 07St.Andrew's Festival
page.content: There are two St. Andrew's Festivals. A competitive festival takes place every year in March, and is open to all age groups to compete in their own class. Adjudicators from across the country judge the competitors, and it provides a good opportunity for young people to perform in public. Classes range from drama to instrumental playing of all kinds, singing and verse speaking. Also, each November, there is a two week performing arts festival when professional performers entertain. There is a varied programme which tries to provide something of interest for all tastes.
